Title: Relates to allowing severely disabled individuals to renew parking permits without providing updated medical records
Summary: Allows severely disabled individuals to apply for renewal of a parking permit for a handicapped person without providing updated medical records.
LawCode: Amd ยง1203-a, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing severely disabled individuals to renew parking permits without providing updated medical records
